name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 5 relics.
- Requires StSLib to run.

v0.4.0
- HP changed to 72 (was 64)
- Changed name of cards to match the theme more.
- Spare Bottle is removed from the starting deck, and is now Event-only.
- Some cards have a <Tag> next to their name, which indicates they are different versions of same card. Tag difference matter for Uniqueness too.
- Various balance changes.

- For more information, visit
https://github.com/Celicath/GathererMod/releases

v0.3.1
- Mining Stirke deals 1 more damage (partial revert)
- Fixed bug where Scent of Rosmari was retaining cards for more than 1 turn.
- Flower Power is now Uncommon.
- Fixed Lucky Clover's wrong description.
